mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route ( routeTraffic, routeStartLocation, routeEndLocation, userId, startlatitude, startlongitude, endlatitude, endlongitude,routeTime, routeOrder) VALUES ( #{routeTraffic}, #{routeStartLocation}, #{routeEndLocation}, #{userId}, #{startlatitude}, #{startlongitude}, #{endlatitude}, #{endlongitude}, #{routeTime}, #{routeOrder})
